subject: Re: [junit] Regarding Swing testing
msgSnippet: http://www.diasparsoftware.com. Go to the Articles/Portfolio section and read JUnit: A Starter Guide . Also read the references. *********** REPLY SEPARATOR
messageBody:
http://www.diasparsoftware.com Go to the "Articles/Portfolio" section
and read "JUnit: A Starter Guide".

Also read the references.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

>

>
>bye
>Cheluva .
